pullRequest.title: NXP-28139: add docker and docker-json templates
pullRequest.bodyText:
The goal is to stop logging to files when using the docker template and to log in json when using the docker-json template. So the newly introduced log4j2.xml are similar to the original Tomcat /server/nuxeo-server-tomcat/src/main/resources/tomcat/lib/log4j2.xml file but they have no file appenders.
Please note there are still log files used by the nuxeo Launcher project which has its own embeded log4j2.xml configuration. It logs limited amount of infos concerning Launch and ConfigGenerator (the launching and stopping infos, the included templates, time taken to start and stop event..)
That log4j2.xml file is embeded in the final nuxeo-launcher-*.jar so wen can't change it easily.

beforeCommit.message: NXP-28139: add docker and docker-json templates

afterCommit.message: NXP-28139: add docker and docker-json templates

beforeCommit.message: NXP-28139: add docker and docker-json templates

afterCommit.message: NXP-28139: add docker and docker-json templates

nodes.bodyText:
We should enable compact for a production configuration which is the intent of this file.
Furthemore, I think eventEol should be enable too in order to have one log per line.
complete looks like a debug option to me and shouldn't be changed:

If true, the appender includes the JSON header and footer, and comma between records. Defaults to false.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,208 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<!-- Log4j Configuration - For more configuration information and examples see https://logging.apache.org/log4j/2.x/ -->
+<Configuration monitorInterval="30">
+  <Appenders>
+    <!-- ============================== -->
+    <!-- Append messages to the console -->
+    <!-- ============================== -->
+    <Console name="ConsoleJSONAppender" target="SYSTEM_OUT">
+        <JsonLayout complete="false" compact="false"/>

@@ -0,0 +1,208 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<!-- Log4j Configuration - For more configuration information and examples see https://logging.apache.org/log4j/2.x/ -->
+<Configuration monitorInterval="30">
+  <Appenders>
+    <!-- ============================== -->
+    <!-- Append messages to the console -->
+    <!-- ============================== -->
+    <Console name="ConsoleJSONAppender" target="SYSTEM_OUT">
+        <JsonLayout complete="false" compact="false"/>
+    </Console>
+
+    <!-- Clustering logging -->
+    <!-- Uncomment the following to redirect the org.jgroups and org.jboss.ha categories to a cluster.log file.
+    <File name="CLUSTER" fileName="${sys:nuxeo.log.dir}/cluster.log" append="false">
+      <PatternLayout pattern="%d{ISO8601} %-5p [%t] [%c] %m%n" />
+    </File>
+    -->
+
+    <!-- VCS Storage logging -->
+    <!--
+    <File name="STORAGE" fileName="${sys:nuxeo.log.dir}/storage.log" append="false">
+      <PatternLayout pattern="%d{ISO8601} %-5p [%t] [%c] %m%n" />
+    </File>
+    -->
+    <!-- Elasticsearch logging -->
+    <!--
+    <File name="ELASTIC" fileName="${sys:nuxeo.log.dir}/elastic.log" append="false">
+      <PatternLayout pattern="%d{ISO8601} %-5p [%t] [%c] %m%n" />
+    </File>
+    -->
+
+    <!-- ====================== -->
+    <!-- More Appender examples -->
+    <!-- ====================== -->
+
+    <!-- Automation Trace appender - add ref into automation.core category
+    <RollingFile name="AUTOMATION" fileName="${sys:nuxeo.log.dir}/automation.log"
+                 filePattern="${sys:nuxeo.log.dir}/automation-%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.log.gz" append="true">
+      <PatternLayout pattern="%d{ISO8601} %-5p [%t] [%c] %m%n" />
+      <CronTriggeringPolicy schedule="0 0 0 * * ?" evaluateOnStartup="true" />
+      <DefaultRolloverStrategy />
+    </RollingFile>
+    -->
+
+    <!-- Buffer events and log them asynchronously
+    <Async name="ASYNC" >
+      <AppenderRef ref="FILE" />
+      <AppenderRef ref="CONSOLE" />
+      <AppenderRef ref="SMTP" />
+    </Async>
+    -->
+
+    <!-- EMail events to an administrator
+    <SMTP name="SMTP" subject="Tomcat Server Errors" to="admin@myhost.domain.com" from="nobody@myhost.domain.com"
+          smtpHost="localhost" smtpPort="25" bufferSize="10">
+      <ThresholdFilter level="ERROR" onMatch="ACCEPT" />
+      <PatternLayout pattern="[%d{ABSOLUTE},%c{1}] %m%n" />
+    </SMTP>
+    -->
+
+    <!-- Syslog events
+    <Syslog name="SYSLOG" host="localhost" facility="LOCAL7">
+      <PatternLayout pattern="[%d{ABSOLUTE},%c{1}] %m%n" />
+    </Syslog>
+    -->
+    <!-- Log events to JMS (requires a topic to be created)
+    <JMS name="JMS" destinationBindingName="topic/MyErrorsTopic" factoryBindingName="java:/ConnectionFactory">
+      <ThresholdFilter level="ERROR" onMatch="ACCEPT" />
+    </JMS>
+    -->
+  </Appenders>
+  <Loggers>
+    <!-- ============= -->
+    <!-- Nuxeo Loggers -->
+    <!-- ============= -->
+
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo" level="warn" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.ecm.core.storage.dbs.DBSCachingRepository" level="warn" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.elasticsearch.ElasticSearchComponent" level="warn" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.elasticsearch.audit.ESAuditBackend" level="warn" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.elasticsearch.audit.ESAuditMigrationWork" level="warn" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.ecm.platform.query.core.PageProviderClassReplacerRegistry" level="warn" />
+
+    <!-- Uncomment to debug fragments pre-processing
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.runtime.deployment.preprocessor" level="info" />
+    -->
+    <!-- Uncomment to debug SQL statements
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.ecm.core.storage.sql.jdbc" level="trace" />
+    -->
+    <!-- Uncomment to debug concurrent session execution errors on thread
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.ecm.core.storage.sql.SessionImpl" level="debug" />
+    -->
+    <!-- Display INFO logs for automation traces when activated -->
+    <!-- Add <appender-ref ref="AUTOMATION" /> if using AUTOMATION appender-->
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.ecm.automation.core" level="warn" />
+    <!-- Display by default WARN logs for Automation Scripting -->
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.ecm.automation.scripting" level="warn" />
+
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.runtime.reload" level="info" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.runtime.osgi.OSGiRuntimeService" level="info" />
+    <!-- Uncomment for components registration info
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.runtime.model.impl" level="info" />
+    -->
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.osgi.application.loader.FrameworkLoader" level="info" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.osgi.application.StandaloneApplication" level="info" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.osgi.application.FrameworkBootstrap" level="info" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.runtime.jboss.deployment.NuxeoDeployer" level="info" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.runtime.tomcat.NuxeoDeployer" level="info" />
+
+    <!-- Clustering logging -->
+    <!-- Uncomment the following to redirect the org.jgroups and org.jboss.ha categories to a cluster.log file.
+    <Logger name="org.jgroups" level="debug" additivity="false">
+      <AppenderRef ref="CLUSTER" />
+    </Logger>
+    <Logger name="org.jboss.ha" level="debug" additivity="false">
+      <AppenderRef ref="CLUSTER" />
+    </Logger>
+    -->
+    <!-- VCS Storage logging -->
+    <!--
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.ecm.core.management.jtajca" level="trace" additivity="false">
+      <AppenderRef ref="STORAGE" />
+    </Logger>
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.ecm.core.storage.sql.jdbc" level="trace" additivity="false">
+      <AppenderRef ref="STORAGE" />
+    </Logger>
+    -->
+    <!--
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.elasticsearch" level="trace" additivity="false">
+      <AppenderRef ref="ELASTIC" />
+    </Logger>
+    -->
+
+    <!-- =================== -->
+    <!-- Third Party Loggers -->
+    <!-- =================== -->
+    <Logger name="org.apache.catalina.loader" level="warn" additivity="false">
+      <AppenderRef ref="CLASSLOADER" />

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<!-- Log4j Configuration - For more configuration information and examples see https://logging.apache.org/log4j/2.x/ -->
+<Configuration monitorInterval="30">
+  <Appenders>
+    <!-- ============================== -->
+    <!-- Append messages to the console -->
+    <!-- ============================== -->
+    <Console name="ConsoleJSONAppender" target="SYSTEM_OUT">
+        <JsonLayout complete="false" compact="false"/>
+    </Console>
+
+    <!-- Clustering logging -->
+    <!-- Uncomment the following to redirect the org.jgroups and org.jboss.ha categories to a cluster.log file.
+    <File name="CLUSTER" fileName="${sys:nuxeo.log.dir}/cluster.log" append="false">
+      <PatternLayout pattern="%d{ISO8601} %-5p [%t] [%c] %m%n" />
+    </File>
+    -->
+
+    <!-- VCS Storage logging -->
+    <!--
+    <File name="STORAGE" fileName="${sys:nuxeo.log.dir}/storage.log" append="false">
+      <PatternLayout pattern="%d{ISO8601} %-5p [%t] [%c] %m%n" />
+    </File>
+    -->
+    <!-- Elasticsearch logging -->
+    <!--
+    <File name="ELASTIC" fileName="${sys:nuxeo.log.dir}/elastic.log" append="false">
+      <PatternLayout pattern="%d{ISO8601} %-5p [%t] [%c] %m%n" />
+    </File>
+    -->
+
+    <!-- ====================== -->
+    <!-- More Appender examples -->
+    <!-- ====================== -->
+
+    <!-- Automation Trace appender - add ref into automation.core category
+    <RollingFile name="AUTOMATION" fileName="${sys:nuxeo.log.dir}/automation.log"
+                 filePattern="${sys:nuxeo.log.dir}/automation-%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.log.gz" append="true">
+      <PatternLayout pattern="%d{ISO8601} %-5p [%t] [%c] %m%n" />
+      <CronTriggeringPolicy schedule="0 0 0 * * ?" evaluateOnStartup="true" />
+      <DefaultRolloverStrategy />
+    </RollingFile>
+    -->
+
+    <!-- Buffer events and log them asynchronously
+    <Async name="ASYNC" >
+      <AppenderRef ref="FILE" />
+      <AppenderRef ref="CONSOLE" />
+      <AppenderRef ref="SMTP" />
+    </Async>
+    -->
+
+    <!-- EMail events to an administrator
+    <SMTP name="SMTP" subject="Tomcat Server Errors" to="admin@myhost.domain.com" from="nobody@myhost.domain.com"
+          smtpHost="localhost" smtpPort="25" bufferSize="10">
+      <ThresholdFilter level="ERROR" onMatch="ACCEPT" />
+      <PatternLayout pattern="[%d{ABSOLUTE},%c{1}] %m%n" />
+    </SMTP>
+    -->
+
+    <!-- Syslog events
+    <Syslog name="SYSLOG" host="localhost" facility="LOCAL7">
+      <PatternLayout pattern="[%d{ABSOLUTE},%c{1}] %m%n" />
+    </Syslog>
+    -->
+    <!-- Log events to JMS (requires a topic to be created)
+    <JMS name="JMS" destinationBindingName="topic/MyErrorsTopic" factoryBindingName="java:/ConnectionFactory">
+      <ThresholdFilter level="ERROR" onMatch="ACCEPT" />
+    </JMS>
+    -->
+  </Appenders>
+  <Loggers>
+    <!-- ============= -->
+    <!-- Nuxeo Loggers -->
+    <!-- ============= -->
+
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo" level="warn" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.ecm.core.storage.dbs.DBSCachingRepository" level="warn" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.elasticsearch.ElasticSearchComponent" level="warn" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.elasticsearch.audit.ESAuditBackend" level="warn" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.elasticsearch.audit.ESAuditMigrationWork" level="warn" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.ecm.platform.query.core.PageProviderClassReplacerRegistry" level="warn" />
+
+    <!-- Uncomment to debug fragments pre-processing
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.runtime.deployment.preprocessor" level="info" />
+    -->
+    <!-- Uncomment to debug SQL statements
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.ecm.core.storage.sql.jdbc" level="trace" />
+    -->
+    <!-- Uncomment to debug concurrent session execution errors on thread
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.ecm.core.storage.sql.SessionImpl" level="debug" />
+    -->
+    <!-- Display INFO logs for automation traces when activated -->
+    <!-- Add <appender-ref ref="AUTOMATION" /> if using AUTOMATION appender-->
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.ecm.automation.core" level="warn" />
+    <!-- Display by default WARN logs for Automation Scripting -->
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.ecm.automation.scripting" level="warn" />
+
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.runtime.reload" level="info" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.runtime.osgi.OSGiRuntimeService" level="info" />
+    <!-- Uncomment for components registration info
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.runtime.model.impl" level="info" />
+    -->
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.osgi.application.loader.FrameworkLoader" level="info" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.osgi.application.StandaloneApplication" level="info" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.osgi.application.FrameworkBootstrap" level="info" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.runtime.jboss.deployment.NuxeoDeployer" level="info" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.runtime.tomcat.NuxeoDeployer" level="info" />
+
+    <!-- Clustering logging -->
+    <!-- Uncomment the following to redirect the org.jgroups and org.jboss.ha categories to a cluster.log file.
+    <Logger name="org.jgroups" level="debug" additivity="false">
+      <AppenderRef ref="CLUSTER" />
+    </Logger>
+    <Logger name="org.jboss.ha" level="debug" additivity="false">
+      <AppenderRef ref="CLUSTER" />
+    </Logger>
+    -->
+    <!-- VCS Storage logging -->
+    <!--
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.ecm.core.management.jtajca" level="trace" additivity="false">
+      <AppenderRef ref="STORAGE" />
+    </Logger>
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.ecm.core.storage.sql.jdbc" level="trace" additivity="false">
+      <AppenderRef ref="STORAGE" />
+    </Logger>
+    -->
+    <!--
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.elasticsearch" level="trace" additivity="false">
+      <AppenderRef ref="ELASTIC" />
+    </Logger>
+    -->
+
+    <!-- =================== -->
+    <!-- Third Party Loggers -->
+    <!-- =================== -->
+    <Logger name="org.apache.catalina.loader" level="warn" additivity="false">
+      <AppenderRef ref="CLASSLOADER" />
+    </Logger>
+    <Logger name="org.apache.catalina.core.AprLifecycleListener" level="info" additivity="false">
+      <AppenderRef ref="TOMCAT" />

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<!-- Log4j Configuration - For more configuration information and examples see https://logging.apache.org/log4j/2.x/ -->
+<Configuration monitorInterval="30">
+  <Appenders>
+    <!-- ============================== -->
+    <!-- Append messages to the console -->
+    <!-- ============================== -->
+    <Console name="CONSOLE" target="SYSTEM_OUT">
+      <ThresholdFilter level="INFO" onMatch="ACCEPT" />
+      <PatternLayout pattern="%d{ISO8601} %-5p [%c{1}] %m%n" />
+    </Console>
+
+    <!-- Clustering logging -->
+    <!-- Uncomment the following to redirect the org.jgroups and org.jboss.ha categories to a cluster.log file.
+    <File name="CLUSTER" fileName="${sys:nuxeo.log.dir}/cluster.log" append="false">
+      <PatternLayout pattern="%d{ISO8601} %-5p [%t] [%c] %m%n" />
+    </File>
+    -->
+
+    <!-- VCS Storage logging -->
+    <!--
+    <File name="STORAGE" fileName="${sys:nuxeo.log.dir}/storage.log" append="false">
+      <PatternLayout pattern="%d{ISO8601} %-5p [%t] [%c] %m%n" />
+    </File>
+    -->
+    <!-- Elasticsearch logging -->
+    <!--
+    <File name="ELASTIC" fileName="${sys:nuxeo.log.dir}/elastic.log" append="false">
+      <PatternLayout pattern="%d{ISO8601} %-5p [%t] [%c] %m%n" />
+    </File>
+    -->
+
+    <!-- ====================== -->
+    <!-- More Appender examples -->
+    <!-- ====================== -->
+
+    <!-- Automation Trace appender - add ref into automation.core category
+    <RollingFile name="AUTOMATION" fileName="${sys:nuxeo.log.dir}/automation.log"
+                 filePattern="${sys:nuxeo.log.dir}/automation-%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.log.gz" append="true">
+      <PatternLayout pattern="%d{ISO8601} %-5p [%t] [%c] %m%n" />
+      <CronTriggeringPolicy schedule="0 0 0 * * ?" evaluateOnStartup="true" />
+      <DefaultRolloverStrategy />
+    </RollingFile>
+    -->
+
+    <!-- Buffer events and log them asynchronously
+    <Async name="ASYNC" >
+      <AppenderRef ref="FILE" />
+      <AppenderRef ref="CONSOLE" />
+      <AppenderRef ref="SMTP" />
+    </Async>
+    -->
+
+    <!-- EMail events to an administrator
+    <SMTP name="SMTP" subject="Tomcat Server Errors" to="admin@myhost.domain.com" from="nobody@myhost.domain.com"
+          smtpHost="localhost" smtpPort="25" bufferSize="10">
+      <ThresholdFilter level="ERROR" onMatch="ACCEPT" />
+      <PatternLayout pattern="[%d{ABSOLUTE},%c{1}] %m%n" />
+    </SMTP>
+    -->
+
+    <!-- Syslog events
+    <Syslog name="SYSLOG" host="localhost" facility="LOCAL7">
+      <PatternLayout pattern="[%d{ABSOLUTE},%c{1}] %m%n" />
+    </Syslog>
+    -->
+    <!-- Log events to JMS (requires a topic to be created)
+    <JMS name="JMS" destinationBindingName="topic/MyErrorsTopic" factoryBindingName="java:/ConnectionFactory">
+      <ThresholdFilter level="ERROR" onMatch="ACCEPT" />
+    </JMS>
+    -->
+  </Appenders>
+  <Loggers>
+    <!-- ============= -->
+    <!-- Nuxeo Loggers -->
+    <!-- ============= -->
+
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo" level="warn" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.ecm.core.storage.dbs.DBSCachingRepository" level="warn" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.elasticsearch.ElasticSearchComponent" level="warn" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.elasticsearch.audit.ESAuditBackend" level="warn" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.elasticsearch.audit.ESAuditMigrationWork" level="warn" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.ecm.platform.query.core.PageProviderClassReplacerRegistry" level="warn" />
+
+    <!-- Uncomment to debug fragments pre-processing
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.runtime.deployment.preprocessor" level="info" />
+    -->
+    <!-- Uncomment to debug SQL statements
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.ecm.core.storage.sql.jdbc" level="trace" />
+    -->
+    <!-- Uncomment to debug concurrent session execution errors on thread
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.ecm.core.storage.sql.SessionImpl" level="debug" />
+    -->
+    <!-- Display INFO logs for automation traces when activated -->
+    <!-- Add <appender-ref ref="AUTOMATION" /> if using AUTOMATION appender-->
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.ecm.automation.core" level="warn" />
+    <!-- Display by default WARN logs for Automation Scripting -->
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.ecm.automation.scripting" level="warn" />
+
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.runtime.reload" level="info" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.runtime.osgi.OSGiRuntimeService" level="info" />
+    <!-- Uncomment for components registration info
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.runtime.model.impl" level="info" />
+    -->
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.osgi.application.loader.FrameworkLoader" level="info" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.osgi.application.StandaloneApplication" level="info" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.osgi.application.FrameworkBootstrap" level="info" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.runtime.jboss.deployment.NuxeoDeployer" level="info" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.runtime.tomcat.NuxeoDeployer" level="info" />
+
+    <!-- Clustering logging -->
+    <!-- Uncomment the following to redirect the org.jgroups and org.jboss.ha categories to a cluster.log file.
+    <Logger name="org.jgroups" level="debug" additivity="false">
+      <AppenderRef ref="CLUSTER" />
+    </Logger>
+    <Logger name="org.jboss.ha" level="debug" additivity="false">
+      <AppenderRef ref="CLUSTER" />
+    </Logger>
+    -->
+    <!-- VCS Storage logging -->
+    <!--
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.ecm.core.management.jtajca" level="trace" additivity="false">
+      <AppenderRef ref="STORAGE" />
+    </Logger>
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.ecm.core.storage.sql.jdbc" level="trace" additivity="false">
+      <AppenderRef ref="STORAGE" />
+    </Logger>
+    -->
+    <!--
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.elasticsearch" level="trace" additivity="false">
+      <AppenderRef ref="ELASTIC" />
+    </Logger>
+    -->
+
+    <!-- =================== -->
+    <!-- Third Party Loggers -->
+    <!-- =================== -->
+    <Logger name="org.apache.catalina.loader" level="warn" additivity="false">
+      <AppenderRef ref="CLASSLOADER" />

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<!-- Log4j Configuration - For more configuration information and examples see https://logging.apache.org/log4j/2.x/ -->
+<Configuration monitorInterval="30">
+  <Appenders>
+    <!-- ============================== -->
+    <!-- Append messages to the console -->
+    <!-- ============================== -->
+    <Console name="CONSOLE" target="SYSTEM_OUT">
+      <ThresholdFilter level="INFO" onMatch="ACCEPT" />
+      <PatternLayout pattern="%d{ISO8601} %-5p [%c{1}] %m%n" />
+    </Console>
+
+    <!-- Clustering logging -->
+    <!-- Uncomment the following to redirect the org.jgroups and org.jboss.ha categories to a cluster.log file.
+    <File name="CLUSTER" fileName="${sys:nuxeo.log.dir}/cluster.log" append="false">

+    </File>

+    <!-- ====================== -->
+    <!-- More Appender examples -->
+    <!-- ====================== -->
+
+    <!-- Automation Trace appender - add ref into automation.core category
+    <RollingFile name="AUTOMATION" fileName="${sys:nuxeo.log.dir}/automation.log"
+                 filePattern="${sys:nuxeo.log.dir}/automation-%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.log.gz" append="true">
+      <PatternLayout pattern="%d{ISO8601} %-5p [%t] [%c] %m%n" />
+      <CronTriggeringPolicy schedule="0 0 0 * * ?" evaluateOnStartup="true" />
+      <DefaultRolloverStrategy />
+    </RollingFile>
+    -->

+    <!-- Buffer events and log them asynchronously
+    <Async name="ASYNC" >
+      <AppenderRef ref="FILE" />
+      <AppenderRef ref="CONSOLE" />
+      <AppenderRef ref="SMTP" />
+    </Async>
+    -->
+
+    <!-- EMail events to an administrator
+    <SMTP name="SMTP" subject="Tomcat Server Errors" to="admin@myhost.domain.com" from="nobody@myhost.domain.com"
+          smtpHost="localhost" smtpPort="25" bufferSize="10">
+      <ThresholdFilter level="ERROR" onMatch="ACCEPT" />
+      <PatternLayout pattern="[%d{ABSOLUTE},%c{1}] %m%n" />
+    </SMTP>
+    -->
+
+    <!-- Syslog events
+    <Syslog name="SYSLOG" host="localhost" facility="LOCAL7">
+      <PatternLayout pattern="[%d{ABSOLUTE},%c{1}] %m%n" />
+    </Syslog>
+    -->

+    <JMS name="JMS" destinationBindingName="topic/MyErrorsTopic" factoryBindingName="java:/ConnectionFactory">
+      <ThresholdFilter level="ERROR" onMatch="ACCEPT" />
+    </JMS>
+    -->
+  </Appenders>
+  <Loggers>
+    <!-- ============= -->
+    <!-- Nuxeo Loggers -->
+    <!-- ============= -->
+
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo" level="warn" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.ecm.core.storage.dbs.DBSCachingRepository" level="warn" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.elasticsearch.ElasticSearchComponent" level="warn" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.elasticsearch.audit.ESAuditBackend" level="warn" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.elasticsearch.audit.ESAuditMigrationWork" level="warn" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.ecm.platform.query.core.PageProviderClassReplacerRegistry" level="warn" />
+
+    <!-- Uncomment to debug fragments pre-processing
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.runtime.deployment.preprocessor" level="info" />
+    -->
+    <!-- Uncomment to debug SQL statements
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.ecm.core.storage.sql.jdbc" level="trace" />
+    -->
+    <!-- Uncomment to debug concurrent session execution errors on thread
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.ecm.core.storage.sql.SessionImpl" level="debug" />
+    -->
+    <!-- Display INFO logs for automation traces when activated -->
+    <!-- Add <appender-ref ref="AUTOMATION" /> if using AUTOMATION appender-->
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.ecm.automation.core" level="warn" />
+    <!-- Display by default WARN logs for Automation Scripting -->
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.ecm.automation.scripting" level="warn" />
+
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.runtime.reload" level="info" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.runtime.osgi.OSGiRuntimeService" level="info" />
+    <!-- Uncomment for components registration info
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.runtime.model.impl" level="info" />
+    -->
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.osgi.application.loader.FrameworkLoader" level="info" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.osgi.application.StandaloneApplication" level="info" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.osgi.application.FrameworkBootstrap" level="info" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.runtime.jboss.deployment.NuxeoDeployer" level="info" />
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.runtime.tomcat.NuxeoDeployer" level="info" />
+
+    <!-- Clustering logging -->
+    <!-- Uncomment the following to redirect the org.jgroups and org.jboss.ha categories to a cluster.log file.
+    <Logger name="org.jgroups" level="debug" additivity="false">
+      <AppenderRef ref="CLUSTER" />
+    </Logger>
+    <Logger name="org.jboss.ha" level="debug" additivity="false">
+      <AppenderRef ref="CLUSTER" />
+    </Logger>
+    -->
+    <!-- VCS Storage logging -->
+    <!--
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.ecm.core.management.jtajca" level="trace" additivity="false">
+      <AppenderRef ref="STORAGE" />
+    </Logger>
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.ecm.core.storage.sql.jdbc" level="trace" additivity="false">
+      <AppenderRef ref="STORAGE" />
+    </Logger>
+    -->
+    <!--
+    <Logger name="org.nuxeo.elasticsearch" level="trace" additivity="false">
+      <AppenderRef ref="ELASTIC" />
+    </Logger>
+    -->
+
+    <!-- =================== -->
+    <!-- Third Party Loggers -->
+    <!-- =================== -->
+    <Logger name="org.apache.catalina.loader" level="warn" additivity="false">
+      <AppenderRef ref="CLASSLOADER" />
+    </Logger>
+    <Logger name="org.apache.catalina.core.AprLifecycleListener" level="info" additivity="false">
+      <AppenderRef ref="TOMCAT" />

nodes.bodyText:
The two lines preceding the one you introduced also deals with JSON and was added for NXP-25096.
The ticket is mainly about log4j 1 so we should be able to remove these lines.
Note: Link the given ticket to yours as it is the same topic just a different logging backend.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -180,6 +180,8 @@
         <include name="log4j-*" /> <!-- log4j2 / bridges: jcl, slf4j, log4j -->
         <include name="json-smart-*" />
         <include name="jsonevent-layout-*" />
+        <!-- install log4j2 JSON logging dependencies in container classpath -->
+        <include name="jackson-*" />

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,201 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<!-- Log4j Configuration - For more configuration information and examples see https://logging.apache.org/log4j/2.x/ -->
+<Configuration monitorInterval="30">
+  <Appenders>
+    <!-- ============================== -->
+    <!-- Append messages to the console -->
+    <!-- ============================== -->
+    <Console name="ConsoleJSONAppender" target="SYSTEM_OUT">
+        <JsonLayout eventEol="true" compact="true"/>
